caption.center: THE STATE OF WASHINGTON, Respondent v. JONATHAN CRAIG CURTIS,

court.center: The Court of Appeals of Washington, Division One.

posture.unpublished: [EDITOR'S NOTE: This case is unpublished as indicated by the issuing court.] Appeal from a judgment of the Superior Court for Snohomish County, No. 97-1-00309-6, Richard J. Thorpe, J., entered February 23, 1998.

opinion_text.unpublished: Affirmed by unpublished opinion per Ellington, J., concurred in by Agid, C.J., and Becker, J.
